Author: Cam_Leon
Text: Oh man. That is the worst. Breaking a fast with poor food choices is just awful. I have a habit of caving from long fasts when my bf asks to go to this local burger place or gyro place. I'll spend the rest of the night on the toilet and throwing up as my body legit rejects it.   If you're feeling physically sick, sip some ginger tea or lukewarm water. Sip. SIP. Forreal, small sips will help. No lax, purging or straight into fast mode right after; eat intuitively for a day or two before you go back to fasting. That's how I help it.
